summary: A Bible professor from 1890 comes forward in time to the present via a time machine and cannot believe the things that he sees!
cast: D. David Morin|Gavin MacLeod|Hal Linden|Jennifer O'Neill|Paul Rodriguez|Richard Riehle|John Valdetero|Dan Campbell|Evan Ellingson|Crystal Robbins|Patti MacLeod|Paul Napier|Charles Hutchins|Callan White|Ross McKerras|Ruben Madera|Mike Wilson|Arthur Roberts|Rod Britt|Ron Sey|Emily Trapp|Brad Heller|Alexander Folk|Teresa Vidak|Paige Peterson|Alana Curry|Nan McNamara|Cassie Byram|Alfred Jackson|Michael Gier|Chipper Lowell|Linda Kerns|William Bowerman|Michelle Dunker|Kevin Downes|Michael Dotson
title: Time Changer
